name: javascript
prelude:
/*
    Your action code will be wrapped inside a function with the following signature:

    async function(message, flow, config) { action code }

    Where:
        - 'message' is the intent message object
        - 'flow' is the hermes-javascript flow object (see: https://github.com/snipsco/hermes-protocol/tree/develop/platforms/hermes-javascript#dialogflow for mode details)
        - 'config' is an object containing your App parameters
            `config.global[…]` or `config.secret[…]`
*/
